Package Restaurant

package Restaurant
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GetInput
    Gets input from the user and throws the InputMismatchException when an input of the a different type is entered, keeps asking the user for input until a valid input is entered.
    GetPeriod
    abstract class contains static methods to get specific inputs from the customer
    MainUI
    The main boundary class that prints the main app options, gets app options from the user, and calls the necessary methods from the necessary classes Instantiates the all classes used
    Member
    This is an entity class.
    Membership
    This is an entity class.
    MembershipController
    Used to manage membership operations.
    Menu
    A Menu object that contains all menu items/set packages
    MenuController
    Used to manage menu related operations such as creating, removing or updating a menu item in the menu
    MenuItem
    This is an entity class.
    MiscController
    Miscellaneous operations are stored in this class
    Order
    An instance of this object represents one order
    OrderController
    Used to manage order operations.
    OrderItem
     
    Payment
    An instance of this class represents a payment for orders of table(s)
    PaymentController
    Used to manage payment operations.
    Receipt
    This is an entity class.
    Reservation
    this is an entity class an instance of this object represents a single Reservation
    ReservationController
     
    Restaurant
    this is an entity class throughout the duration of application runtime, only one instance of this class is created stores main information about the restaurant
    SalesRevenueDay
    An instance of this object represents a Sales Report for the specified date
    SalesRevenueReportController
    Used to control Sales Revenue Report operations
    Staff
     
    Table
    this is an entity class the instance of this object represents a single table
    TableAvailabilityController
    used to manage table availability related operations
    TransHistDay
    An instance of this entity class represents the transaction history for one day
    TransHistItem
    An instance of this entity class represents the collective amount of a certain item sold in a TransHistDay
